summary: WHILE TRAVELING, THE AIR CUSHION PIN BOX CAME APART LEAVING THE TRAILER LOOSE.*MR  THE CONSUMER DISCOVERED THAT THE TWO 1/4 GRADE 5  BOLTS WHICH HELD THE PIN BOX HAD BROKEN AND FALLEN OUT. THE CONSUMER REPLACED THE BOLTS WITH LARGER ONES. *JB

components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,STRUCTURE,UNKNOWN OR OTHER
summary: THE VEHICLE IS A CAMEO LXI RECREATIONAL TRAVEL TRAILER, WHICH MAY NOT FALL IN YOUR JURISDICTION.  I UNDERSTAND, AFTER SOME RESEARCH, THAT THE KY LEMON LAW APPLIES TO AUTOMOBILES ONLY.  I WOULD APPRECIATE IF THERE WERE SOME APPLICABLE LAW THAT WOULD ALLOW ME RECOURSE WITHOUT HAVING TO FILE SUIT.  THIS IS A BRAND NEW 2003 TRAILER, AND THE PROBLEMS STARTED FROM THE BEGINNING.  THE DEALER WAS INFORMED IMMEDIATELY OF  THE PROBLEMS, AND THE MANUFACTURER WAS INFORMED IMMEDIATELY ALSO.  THE RUN-A-ROUND HAS BEEN INCREDIBLE TO SAY THE LEAST.  WE HAVE RECEIVED HELP FROM A DEALER THAT DID NOT SALE US THE TRAILER, BUT DID SOME WARRANTY WORK, SO THERE ARE HONEST PEOPLE OUT THERE WHO HONOR THEIR CALLING AND WORKMANSHIP.  IF HELP IS AVAILABLE, I WOULD APPRECIATE IT.
